HediffDef.label: omni-link hacking implant
HediffDef.description: An installed omni-link hacking implant. A rugged, all-purpose hacking module designed for adaptability in the vast expanse of space. The Omni-Link implant features a configurable retractable data jack, stored discreetly within a subdermal compartment near the lower rib cage, capable of interfacing with a wide range of terminals, locks, and security devices. Wireless connectivity is included for systems without physical access points, though its range and encryption are limited compared to more advanced models.\n\nWhile reliable and versatile, it lacks direct neural integration, requiring manual input through connected devices. It’s hacking stealth algorithms are basic, offering only minimal protection against detection, making careful timing essential during use.
